channel.title: Forum Games Section
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,133199.0.html
why isnt there a forum games section? it would stop all the general discussion games that are not general discussions. Honestly do you play the 3 word game with your friends when you are trying to talk about something other than the three word game? or do you randomly pull out a picture and say whats wrong with this picture while you are trying to talk about a class assignment because you missed a day of school or something???
I personally think we should have one (right below general discussion so everyone can see it)
post replys here

item.title: Forum Games Section
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:9, topic:96601”]We should have the forum… But make it so Post Count Does not count.[/quote]that is a good idea…

[quote=“therealjdb, post:10, topic:96601”]I’d say a child board with no post count addition if anything, Although I know it’d just be all spam.[/quote]a child board of general discussion called the games section would work. although there would need to be a mod of that section because there is usually a lot of posts going on at once. and that section could get spammy…

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Games Section
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“shadow235, post:7, topic:96601”]Just make a “Game” Thread in General section.[/quote]then we would have about 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 games going on at the same time. its a waste. and most of general discussion is games, not actual discussion.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Games Section
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

Just make a “Game” Thread in General section.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Games Section
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

No, thats a dumb idea imo. That section would be the most spammy shit hole ever and I think it would bring the reputation of this whole community down… Well further down than Moparscape.org has already pulled us.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Games Section
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:4, topic:96601”]oic, we used to have an off-topic board, for games etc, but then everyone moved over there and productivity stopped :’(. Mopar deleted it and said its never coming back[/quote]no, im not talking about off topic stuff (thats what general discussion is for), just a forum games section, where all the games people want to play is posted. (like the 3 word game or post your pic or rate the user above you or things like that

Read full topic
